mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.PROJECT_TITLE, F.FILE_UUID, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_PROJECT P, TBL_PROJECT_FILE PF, TBL_FILE F WHERE P.ID = PF.PROJECT_ID AND PF.ID = F.ID

SELECT D.ID, D.DATA_TITLE,D.DATA_READ_COUNT, D.DATA_REGISTER_DATE, F.FILE_UUID , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_DATA D, TBL_DATA_FILE DF, TBL_FILE F WHERE D.ID = DF.DATA_ID AND DF.ID = F.ID ORDER BY D.DATA_READ_COUNT DESC

SELECT D.ID, D.DATA_TITLE,D.DATA_READ_COUNT, D.DATA_REGISTER_DATE, F.FILE_UUID , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_DATA D, TBL_DATA_FILE DF, TBL_FILE F WHERE D.ID = DF.DATA_ID AND DF.ID = F.ID ORDER BY D.DATA_REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT C.ID, C.COMMUNITY_TITLE, C.COMMUNITY_REGISTER_DATE, F.FILE_UUID , F.FILE_NAME , F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_SIZE FROM TBL_COMMUNITY C, TBL_COMMUNITY_FILE CF, TBL_FILE F WHERE C.ID = CF.COMMUNITY_ID AND CF.ID = F.ID ORDER BY C.COMMUNITY_REGISTER_DATE DESC

SELECT F.ID, PROJECT_TITLE, PROJECT_MAJOR, FILE_UUID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, PROJECT_TITLE, PROJECT_MAJOR, FILE_UUID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, P.ID, P.PROJECT_TITLE, P.PROJECT_MAJOR, F.FILE_UUID, F.FILE_NAME, F.FILE_SIZE, F.FILE_PATH FROM TBL_PROJECT P, TBL_PROJECT_FILE PF, TBL_FILE F WHERE P.ID = PF.PROJECT_ID AND PF.ID = F.ID ORDER BY P.ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{mainPagination.page} * #{mainPagination.rowCount} ) F WHERE R > (#{mainPagination.page} - 1) * #{mainPagination.rowCount}
